CustomField.description: If Checked, will add 'ALL ROWS' to the end of the SOQL statement to search the recycle bin. Useful for looking for recently deleted records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Checked, will add 'ALL ROWS' to the end of the SOQL statement to search the recycle bin. Useful for looking for recently deleted records.
CustomField.label: Check Recycle Bin?
